header.title: PORTFOLIO.
header.text_header: Self-taught individual with 7+ years of experience in web development, including 2+ years working in specialized companies, focusing on creating and optimizing software solutions in both frontend and backend.

aboutme.text_aboutme: I began my professional career from my home as a self-taught individual due to my burning passion for learning, taking on new challenges, and continually improving my skills in programming, logic, and performance. My journey in this field is not just about fulfilling a dream of working in front of a computer; it is rooted in my determination to excel and my desire to share my knowledge with the world. Computer science is not just a profession for me; it's a way of life and a true passion. Even when I'm not formally working, my commitment persists. Day after day, I dedicate time to study, explore documentation on the latest technologies, stay informed about emerging trends, and constantly seek opportunities for innovation. My self-taught approach has not only allowed me to acquire valuable skills on my own but has also driven me to overcome obstacles and bring a fresh and creative approach to the projects I engage in. I am convinced that this passion and constant commitment are qualities that can make a difference in any professional environment. With over 7 years of experience in web development, including 2 years in the corporate world, I have specialized in creating and optimizing software solutions in both frontend and backend, using technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, PHP, and NodeJS Express, among others. In my last role at Previlabor, I made significant contributions to improving internal processes, including the implementation of an automated document generation system and a RESTful web API service for Laboratorios Echevarne, resulting in an efficiency increase of over 15%. Furthermore, I achieved a notable optimization in PDF document generation within the company's ERP, reducing processing time from one hour to just 4 seconds. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that not only enhance operational efficiency but also have a positive impact on revenue and productivity. My experience has allowed me to develop strong skills in problem-solving, process optimization, and teamwork. I am looking for opportunities where I can apply my web development expertise and continue to grow professionally.

third: Development of applications for various departments
Consumption and utilization of web services
Analysis of created applications and seeking solutions for improvement
